<<header |=Credits>>


Ocsigen is a collaborative open source project mainly developed by
[[https://www.besport.com|Be Sport]], [[https://www.cnrs.fr|CNRS]] and
[[http://www.univ-paris-diderot.fr|Paris Cité university]].

It comes from a research project of the
[[https://www.irif.fr/|Research Institute for Foundations of Computer Science (IRIF)]]
([[http://www.univ-paris-diderot.fr|Paris Diderot university]] and [[http://www.cnrs.fr|CNRS]]).

It is part of the [[http://www.irill.org|IRILL]],
a center  for  Research and  Innovation  on  Free  Software, located at Inria Paris.

It received funding from [[http://inria.fr|Inria]] and the
[[http://www.agence-nationale-recherche.fr/|ANR]], through three research projects:
*@@class="sponsorprojects"@ @@ //Programmation fonctionnelle pour le Web// (2007-2010)
* //[[http://www-sop.inria.fr/indes/pwd/|PWD]]// (2010-2013) labellised by the [[http://www.systematic-paris-region.org|System@tic cluster]]
* //Ubiquitous Content Framework// (FUI project, [[http://www.systematic-paris-region.org|System@tic cluster]])


It also receive funding from [[https://janestreet.com/|Jane Street]].

==Contact

You can send a (private) e-mail to the [[mailto:contact@ocsigen.org|development team]]. However, please prefer [[https://discuss.ocaml.org|OCaml's discuss]], with tag Ocsigen, for all your technical questions.
You can also have a look at the archives of the [[http://sympa.mancoosi.univ-paris-diderot.fr/wws/info/ocsigen|public mailing-list]] (deprecated).
